comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: Proportion of land allocated to heap leaching technique
- y: Proportion of land allocated to vat leaching technique

Objective:
- Maximize Z = 3x + 5y (tons of rare earth oxide per square mile per day)

Constraints:
1. Total land available: x + y = 100
2. Total extraction machines available: 10x + 20y \leq 100
3. Total polluted wastewater constraint: 8x + 17y \leq 90
